title: Bonus Interview: Comedian Amber Ruffin - Official Friend of the Show
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Comedian Amber Ruffin sits down with Ebro in the Morning for a great conversation on race, her recent career endeavors and the concept behind her segment White History Month. 

The Amber Ruffin Show returns to Peacock April 1! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
